=== Description

---

++++

<p>Rancher Turtles is an extension to Rancher that brings full Cluster API integration to Rancher.</p>

<h2>What's Changed</h2>
<p>This release fixes two CVEs on <code>crypto/x509</code> :<br>
<a href="https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/2025/cve-2025-61729" rel="nofollow">https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/2025/cve-2025-61729</a><br>
<a href="https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/2025/cve-2025-61727" rel="nofollow">https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/2025/cve-2025-61727</a></p>
<h3>Other Changes</h3>
